A significant number of people arrive in Auckland by cruise ship.
ferry companies sail across Cook Strait from

. The ferries take bikes, cars, buses and trains and the scenery on a good day is spectacular. The ferries are substantial ships designed for the sometimes rough conditions and the journey takes 3-3.5h.
